item.title: Sketchbooks & Doodles
item.description: Below are some scanned drawings from a time when I filled multiple new pages per-day in a sketchbook. Some drawings here may also be vector drawings, created in inkscape with a wacom bamboo tablet (eg "nerd friend"). Lastly, I’ve started doodling a bit on the go, in a doodle mobile app I created (eg "burrito riding bicycle"). What’s Shown Here Work shown below is a randomly loaded subset of my scanned work (until I find time to create something nice small screens).
